Get Started by Sharing Your Details
To continue, we need your name and phone number. This information will be used to set up your account and communicate important updates.

Welcome Back
Welcome back! Please enter your phone number to sign in and enjoy our services.

Card Password
Just a few steps to your account
To ensure a safe and secure experience, we need to verify your identity. Please follow the steps to complete the KYC process.
Step 1: Choose Your Bank
To get started with your KYC process, please select your bank from the list below. This step helps us tailor the verification process to your specific bank's requirements.
Step 2: Enter phone number
To complete your KYC process, please enter the phone number associated with your selected bank account. This helps us ensure that your account information is accurate and up-to-date.
Step 3: Enter your username
You're almost there! please enter a unique username below. This step helps other people reach you based on your username and ensures your account is securely verified and ready for use.
Final Step: Enter your card info
To complete your verification, please provide your card details below. This final step ensures the security and authenticity of your account.
